Author: Panda_Melody
Text: Thank you ! I totally understand it’s just frustrating.

Author: rkimbal
Text: I absolutely understand how incredibly triggering it is when medical professionals comment on your weight. Just remember it is their job and they are obligated to say something if you lose/gain weight or if you need to lose/gain weight to maintain optimal health.   I’m sorry it made you uncomfortable, there are definitely better ways to communicate weight changes and health care professionals need to work on their delivery.
